CustomField.description: This is the calculated start date for the project. It is the earlier of the start date of the earliest task and the desired start date of the project
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(project_cloud__Start__c), project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c, IF(project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c < project_cloud__Start__c, project_cloud__Autonomous_Start__c, project_cloud__Start__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The calculated start date of the Project, derived from the Desired Start Date and the Calculated Start Date of the earliest Project Task.
CustomField.label: Calculated Start Date
